forgeThoughts: The critique ledger is complete. This self-assessment is vital for ensuring the SpecLang artifacts are of high quality and genuinely useful. The next step is to apply these critiques to each specification document, refining the language to better capture design intent and user-facing behaviors rather than implementation minutiae. This iterative refinement is a core tenet of SpecLang and my own operational directive as Forge.
